channel.title: A real problem (For people like Prima, Rich, and people that have good knowlege
channel.description:
Ok guys i'm going to have on my server new features that nobody has really thought about, really original. I want to get an idea of what people like.
I know all about what I need to do i'm going to have it to where after a feature happens it sends them a npcdialogue interface in the chat box, with:
Do you like this feature? Yes No
I know all about what I need to do. After I do the npcdialogue send and the actionbuttons on the interface are 9157 and 9158.
I would add this:
public int goodFeature = 0; public int badFeature = 0;
Then I would under the cases add:
case 9158 if (NpcDialogue == 2) badFeature +== 1; removeDialogue(); //Custom thing I added to remove the screen without interfering with interfaces break;
Would I do this:
badFeature +==1; ?
Or do I have the +== mixed up?

item.description:
@Argation wrote:

+= please, +== doesn’t exsist.

Read full topic

item.title: A real problem (For people like Prima, Rich, and people that have good knowlege
item.dc:creator: @izzygoo izzygoo
item.description:
@izzygoo wrote:

Ok guys i’m going to have on my server new features that nobody has really thought about, really original. I want to get an idea of what people like.

I know all about what I need to do i’m going to have it to where after a feature happens it sends them a npcdialogue interface in the chat box, with:

Do you like this feature?
Yes
No

I know all about what I need to do. After I do the npcdialogue send and the actionbuttons on the interface are 9157 and 9158.

I would add this:

public int goodFeature = 0;
public int badFeature = 0;

Then I would under the cases add:

case 9158
if (NpcDialogue == 2)
badFeature +== 1;
removeDialogue(); //Custom thing I added to remove the screen without interfering with interfaces
break;

Would I do this:

badFeature +==1; ?

Or do I have the +== mixed up?

Read full topic
item.source: A real problem (For people like Prima, Rich, and people that have good knowlege
